CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 平的；平坦的；平滑的；水平的；平稳的；连贯的；平缓的；无变化的；平齐的；挨着的；平等的；平均的；公平的；均匀的；相等的；偶数的；双数的；性情平和的；势均力敌的；互不相欠的；正好的；不多不少的；（概率）对半的；各半的
甚至；即使；连；（接比较级）更；还；更加；实际上；的确；甚至可以说；更确切地说；其实
使平均；使相等；使变平；使平整

synonym.mean: 变平；变得可比较；成为相等

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 在晚上的；为晚上的；晚上用的
晚上；傍晚；（联欢性的）晚会；后期
均匀地；平衡地；平坦地；平等地

word_mean_info__list.difference: 侧重指表面十分平滑，无任何粗糙的感觉。引申作圆滑解。
强调没有高低之处，且在同一水平面，可引申指才能相等或与相邻某物平行。
指光滑平整的表面，但不一定是水平的。
通常指平面上的各点或一条直线的各点处在同一平面或直线上。

word_group.brief_definition: 即使, 纵然, 尽管, 虽然
更糟糕的是；更坏；甚至更糟
尽管如此, 即使那样
了账, 扯平, 两清, 两抵
收支平衡, 不赔不赚
(生活、工作等经历困难后)平稳下来, 顺顺当当
摆平；扯平；进行报复；算账
等额投注；各半的；对等的

bilingual.source: You do not even need a studio.
bilingual.target: 你甚至不需要一个工作室。
我甚至做了一些黄瓜花。
甚至可以和你一起玩的机器人。

bilingual.source: One day I'll even go to Australia.
bilingual.target: 有一天我甚至会去澳大利亚。

list.abstract: Even，英文单词，做形容词时指“平的、平坦的”；做副词时指“甚至、实际上”；做及物动词时指“使平坦、使相等”。
Even，挪威电视剧《skam》第三季主角，高中三年级。

yingyinNormal.en: You'll even see where it is.
yingyinNormal.zh: 甚至能看到它在哪。

yingyinNormal.en: We don't even have a place to live. This sucks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们甚至无家可归，一切都糟透了。

yingyinNormal.en: Nothing. We're not doing anything. We're not even out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们没干什么，我们甚至没出去。

yingyinNormal.en: And in their use of color, flowers went even further.
yingyinNormal.zh: 花对颜色的利用甚至达到了更高的境界。

yingyinNormal.en: Define "I might even like you more than 'like you."
yingyinNormal.zh: 解释一下“甚至可能比喜欢你还要喜欢你”。

yingyinNormal.en: Like my dough, this could even be done overnight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就像我的面团一样，甚至可能花费一晚上来做。

yingyinNormal.en: He's so diversified, he doesn't even know what he owns.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他的产业太多元化了，他甚至不清楚自己拥有什么。

yingyinNormal.en: Marijuana, Cocaine, MDA, Heroin, Assault weapons and even murder.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大麻，可卡因，MDA，海洛因，攻击性武器，甚至可以雇凶杀人。

yingyinNormal.en: My people never even left the house. I'm not even cream cheese. I'm American cheese. I'm individually wrapped. Here I come.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的家人甚至都没出过这个国家。我甚至不是奶油干酪女神。我就是美国奶酪，还是独立包装的。接好了。

yingyinNormal.en: I didn't even have a chance to act as though I'm okay with it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我甚至没办法假装，我不会在意。

yingyinNormal.en: You can even join a cruise to see the lava pour into the ocean.
yingyinNormal.zh: 您甚至可以乘搭游船观看熔岩涌入大海。

yingyinNormal.en: She even cares about me. And I've done very little to earn that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她甚至很关心我，虽然我几乎啥也没做。

yingyinNormal.en: I can't believe it. Yeah. They even do you. They do me?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我简直无法相信。他们甚至还模仿你。模仿我？

yingyinNormal.en: All with the knowledge that no one would ever even know her name.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她明知，甚至没有一个人会知道她的名字。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't want to ruin anything. I don't even want to meet the prince.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不是想捣乱，我甚至不指望能见到王子。

yingyinNormal.en: It was an even higher level, it influenced others I didn't even know in ways I could never imagine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是更高一层的，它甚至影响了我不认识的人，这是我从来没有想过的。

yingyinNormal.en: I can't seem to get her attention. Or even say the right thing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我似乎无法引起她的注意，甚至都没法把话说对。

yingyinNormal.en: Midge is even breaking up with Moose. No. About time, right?
yingyinNormal.zh: 米吉甚至和慕思分手了。不会吧。早该改了，对吧？

yingyinNormal.en: They could lie to us. Maybe even hurt us or the guests.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们可以对我们撒谎了，甚至可能会伤害我们或是游客。

yingyinNormal.en: I want to be challenged, and I guess I might even want to be needed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想要迎接挑战，甚至我想得到被需要的感觉。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 不平行地；不均衡地；不平坦地
adv. 均匀地；平等地；平衡地；平坦地

sense_info_list.en: used to emphasize something surprising or extreme

examination_example.sentence: As it turns out, many people are actually perfectly willing to talk—and may <highlight>even</highlight> be flattered to receive your attention.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实证明，许多人实际上非常愿意交谈——甚至可能会因为得到你的关注而受宠若惊。

examination_example.sentence: A move back to self-sufficiency, the argument goes, would boost the farming industry, political sovereignty and <highlight>even</highlight> the nation's health.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种观点认为，回归自给自足将促进农业、政治主权甚至国家健康。

examination_example.sentence: Believe it or not, a warm embrace might <highlight>even</highlight> help you avoid getting sick this winter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 信不信由你，一个温暖的拥抱甚至可以帮助你避免在这个冬天生病。

sense_info_list.en: despite the fact or belief that

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Even</highlight> if you cannot close that gap, maybe you can close others, and doing so would be to the benefit of all concerned.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使你不能弥合这一差距，也许你可以弥合其他的差距，而且这样做对所有相关方都有利。

examination_example.sentence: However, <highlight>even</highlight> though it's common, it's important to keep in mind that.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，即使是这很常见，牢记这一点也很重要。

examination_example.sentence: It doesn't feel like a human or democratic relationship, <highlight>even</highlight> if both sides benefit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 感觉不像是人情关系或者民主关系，即使双方都受益。

sense_info_list.en: used in comparisons for emphasis

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Even</highlight> better would be to help elevate notions of beauty beyond the material standards of a particular industry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 更好的办法是帮助提升美的概念，使其超越特定行业的物质标准。

examination_example.sentence: As the industry advances, however, other suits may have an <highlight>even</highlight> greater impact.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，随着行业的发展，其他诉讼可能会产生甚至更大的影响。

examination_example.sentence: At the state level their influence can be <highlight>even</highlight> more fearsome.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在州一级，他们的影响甚至更可怕。

sense_info_list.en: despite what has or had happened

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Even</highlight> so, employers complain they aren't given all the workers they need.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即便如此，雇主们也抱怨他们没有得到他们需要的所有工人。

examination_example.sentence: But <highlight>even</highlight> now, 54 percent of the jobs in the country are middle-skill jobs, such as construction and high-skill manufacturing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但即使到现在，该国54%的工作是中等技能工作，如建筑和高技能制造业。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Even</highlight> so, kings and queens undoubtedly have a downside.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即便如此，国王和王后无疑也有缺点。

sense_info_list.en: at the very same time as

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Even</highlight> as humans count on forests to soak up the carbon dioxide, we are threatening their ability to do so.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使人类指望森林吸收二氧化碳，我们也在威胁他们这样做的能力。

examination_example.sentence: This advice is more relevant now than ever before, <highlight>even</highlight> as more parents want to embrace the ideas of their children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个建议现在比以往任何时候都更中肯，恰好现在更多的父母想要接受他们孩子的想法。

examination_example.sentence: But <highlight>even</highlight> as the number of English speakers expands further there are signs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，正当使用英语的人数进一步增加时，却也出现了这样一些迹象。

sense_info_list.en: equally balanced; not giving an advantage to one side

examination_example.sentence: The rule "limited states' ability to seek long-term prosperity and has prevented market participants from competing on an <highlight>even</highlight> playing field."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该规则“限制了各州寻求长期繁荣的能力，并阻止了市场参与者在公平的竞争环境中竞争。”

sense_info_list.en: equable; calm

examination_example.sentence: Simply slowing the pace and talking in an <highlight>even</highlight> tone helps the other person cool down and does the same for you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 简单地放慢节奏，用平和的语气说话，有助于对方冷静下来，对你也是如此。

sense_info_list.en: the end of the day; evening
not changing very much in amount, speed, etc.
flat and smooth
equal in number, amount, or value
divisible by two without a remainder

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 不平行地；不均衡地；不平坦地
adv. 均匀地；平等地；平衡地；平坦地

sense_info_list.en: to a greater or surprising extent or degree

examination_example.sentence: Employees will be offered a career that is <highlight>even</highlight> more fulfilling and more rewarding.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 员工将获得更令人满足、更有回报的职业。

examination_example.sentence: In many rich countries, by contrast, roads are becoming <highlight>even</highlight> safer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对比之下，在许多富裕国家，道路变得更加安全。

examination_example.sentence: The so-called "ghostwriting" can take various forms: books, articles, autobiographies, and <highlight>even</highlight> social media posts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所谓的“代笔”可以采用各种形式：书籍、文章、自传，甚至社交媒体帖子。

examination_example.sentence: Much to their frustration, managers often struggle to get their staff to comply with <highlight>even</highlight> simple instructions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 令人沮丧的是，即使是简单的指示，管理者也常常难以让员工遵守。

examination_example.sentence: It's the cathedral of every French person, <highlight>even</highlight> those who have never visited it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它是每个法国人的大教堂，即使是那些从未参观过它的人。

examination_example.sentence: Once again people began to argue whether Notre Dame Cathedral was going to collapse <highlight>even</highlight> without the fire.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们再次开始争论，即使没有火灾，巴黎圣母院是否会倒塌。

sense_info_list.en: the end of the day
having a flat, smooth, or level surface

word_usage.usage:
even单独不能用作连词，even if/though可以用做连词，表示“即使”，常用来引导让步状语从句。
 示例：即使他亲自来，我也不会把车借给他。
误 Even he comes in person, I won't lend him my car.
正 Even if/though he comes in person, I won't lend him my car.

even if引导状语从句时，不可受汉语影响而赘用连词but。
示例：就算那是真的，也没有关系。
误 Even if that's true， but it doesn't make any difference.
正 Even if that's true， it doesn't make any difference.

even做副词时在句中应位于be动词/助动词/情态动词之后，实义动词之前。
示例：(1) He has even broken her bike.
他甚至把她的自行车弄坏了。
(2) He's rude to everybody. He's even rude to his father.
他对大家都不礼貌，甚至对自己父亲也不礼貌。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 通常指表面平整无凸起的。
指光滑平整的表面, 无凹凸、倾斜或弯曲之处, 但不一定是水平的。
强调没有高低之处, 且在同一水平面, 可引申指才能相等或与相邻某物平行; 也指两事物齐平的, 常用搭配： level with。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 不平行地；不均衡地；不平坦地
adv. 均匀地；平等地；平衡地；平坦地

sense_info_list.en: to a greater or surprising extent or degree

examination_example.sentence: But among those who stayed on, the close losers performed <highlight>even</highlight> better than the narrow winners.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但在那些剩下的人里，差点成功的失败者甚至比险胜者还优秀。

examination_example.sentence: They will come to the café <highlight>even</highlight> more frequently.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们会更频繁得地去咖啡厅。

examination_example.sentence: Assumptions about poor people become <highlight>even</highlight> more negative when they live on welfare.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当穷人靠福利生活时，对他们的假设变得更加消极。

examination_example.sentence: And <highlight>even</highlight> if I get a promotion, I'm not guaranteed to get a raise.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而且，即使我升职了，也不一定能加薪。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Even</highlight> those short of time or money should be encouraged to cook for themselves and their family.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也要鼓励那些即便是没有时间或缺钱的人为自己和家人做饭。

examination_example.sentence: The doer of a good deed can feel spiritually rewarded <highlight>even</highlight> when they gain no concrete benefits.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 做好事的人即使没有得到具体的好处，也能获得精神上的回报。

sense_info_list.en: at the very time
having a flat; smooth; or level surface

word_usage.usage:
even if引导状语从句时，不可受汉语影响而赘用连词but。
示例：就算那是真的，也没有关系。
误 Even if that's true， but it doesn't make any difference.
正 Even if that's true， it doesn't make any difference.

even单独不能用作连词，even if/though可以用做连词，表示“即使”，常用来引导让步状语从句。
 示例：即使他亲自来，我也不会把车借给他。
误 Even he comes in person, I won't lend him my car.
正 Even if/though he comes in person, I won't lend him my car.

even做副词时在句中应位于be动词/助动词/情态动词之后，实义动词之前。
示例：(1) He has even broken her bike.
他甚至把她的自行车弄坏了。
(2) He's rude to everybody. He's even rude to his father.
他对大家都不礼貌，甚至对自己父亲也不礼貌。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 通常指表面平整无凸起的。
指光滑平整的表面，无凹凸、倾斜或弯曲之处，但不一定是水平的。
强调没有高低之处，且在同一水平面，可引申指才能相等或与相邻某物平行; 也指两事物齐平的，常用搭配： level with。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: to a greater or surprising extent or degree

examination_example.sentence: While the validity of the idea is still being assessed, the lowered stress can <highlight>even</highlight> be tied back to blood pressure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然这一想法的有效性仍在评估中，但降低的压力甚至可能与血压有关。

examination_example.sentence: The trailer <highlight>even</highlight> has matching carpet and curtains.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个拖车甚至还有配套的地毯和窗帘。

examination_example.sentence: Re-routed me through Newark and got me back to the UK <highlight>even</highlight> earlier than originally scheduled.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我改道从纽瓦克回英国比原计划的更早到达。

examination_example.sentence: But <highlight>even</highlight> then, what he had wasn't quite what he wanted.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但即使在那时，他所拥有的并不完全是他想要的。

examination_example.sentence: He showed us that <highlight>even</highlight> a single desire, never given up on, can make for a remarkable life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他告诉我们，即使只有一个愿望，只要永不放弃，也能拥有非凡的人生。

examination_example.sentence: I keep practicing <highlight>even</highlight> when I'm extremely tired.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使我非常累，我也会坚持练习。

sense_info_list.en: used to say that if something is the case or not, the result is the same

examination_example.sentence: There is something to be said for being a generalist, <highlight>even</highlight> if you are a specialist.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使你是专家，成为一个通才也有用处。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Even</highlight> if this method of timekeeping is novel in its particulars, early agricultural societies also connected time to natural phenomena.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使这种计时方法在细节上很新颖，早期的农业社会还是将时间与自然现象联系在一起。

examination_example.sentence: It was tiring work, but I looked forward to the pay, <highlight>even</highlight> though I wasn't sure how much it would amount to.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这份工作虽累人，但我又期待发工资，尽管我不确定总共能给多少钱。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 甚至更; 还(比较时表示强调)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 更糟糕的是；更坏；甚至更糟

sense_info_list.en: used to emphasize something surprising or extreme

examination_example.sentence: Drinking tea is very popular in China and <highlight>even</highlight> around the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 喝茶在中国甚至全世界都很受欢迎。

examination_example.sentence: Do not take a short cuts through dark areas, <highlight>even</highlight> if it will make your trip much faster.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不要抄近路穿过黑暗的地区，即使这会让你的旅行快得多。

examination_example.sentence: I think everyone should try to be a good role model, <highlight>even</highlight> if you are not a celebrity!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我认为每个人都应该努力成为一个好的榜样，即使你不是名人！

sense_info_list.en: used in comparisons for emphasis
sense_info_list.zh: 甚至更; 还(比较时表示强调)

examination_example.sentence: The news is <highlight>even</highlight> worse for teens.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个消息对青少年来说更糟糕。

examination_example.sentence: Dramas make me <highlight>even</highlight> sadder.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 戏剧让我更难过。

examination_example.sentence: It could play chess <highlight>even</highlight> better than humans.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它下棋可以比人类下得更好。

word_usage.usage:
even单独不能用作连词，even if/though可以用做连词，表示“即使”，常用来引导让步状语从句。
 示例：即使他亲自来，我也不会把车借给他。
误 Even he comes in person, I won't lend him my car.
正 Even if/though he comes in person, I won't lend him my car.

even if引导状语从句时，不可受汉语影响而赘用连词but。
示例：就算那是真的，也没有关系。
误 Even if that's true， but it doesn't make any difference.
正 Even if that's true， it doesn't make any difference.

even做副词时在句中应位于be动词/助动词/情态动词之后，实义动词之前。
示例：(1) He has even broken her bike.
他甚至把她的自行车弄坏了。
(2) He's rude to everybody. He's even rude to his father.
他对大家都不礼貌，甚至对自己父亲也不礼貌。
